org.netbeans.editor

Class LeafElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.editor.BaseElement
      • org.netbeans.editor.LeafElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Element

    public class LeafElement
extends BaseElement
    Leaf element is used on the leaf level of element tree.
